about_the_game:
The World is Ending


Deep beneath humankind's last remaining refuge lies the key to stopping it, but the upper depths are crawling with threats; from violent beasts seeking prey, to the ghostly reflections of those lost in the collapse. And in the lower depths: horrors beyond imagining.

As a Dive Operator, navigate your team through these perilous routes to uncover the source of the End, and potentially forge a new beginning in the process.

  • Fast Paced Tactical Combat

    Activate skills and place new team members down between rounds; then watch as your divers battle it out with the enemy.



  • Dive into the depths

    Each dive has it's own challenges and layout, but the shifting nature of the below means that what you'll find down there is different every time. Plan your route and scout ahead to ensure your team's survival into the darkest parts of the paths beneath.



  • Prey System

    Explore in any direction you like. But beware: the longer a dive team spends down there, the greater the threats they will attract.

  • Missions

    Take on dangerous missions during your dives to earn greater rewards and progress the plot.

  • Build the Roster

    The Roster are a psionically connected force, waiting for you to unleash them. Build a base strategy from a variety of entries, and grow it as you descend into the depths.



  • Choose your dive lead

    Dive leads are unique and have a variety of skills that shape each descent into the depths.

  • Unlock new options

    As your operator rank grows and you complete unique challenges, more dive leads and roster entries will become available for you to unleash upon your enemies.

name: Rapture Recovery Squad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are placeholder requirements. Actual requirements will appear closer to launch.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are placeholder requirements. Actual requirements will appear closer to launch.

short_description: Rapture Recovery Squad is a dungeon crawling, deck building auto-battler. Map out the depths beneath humanity's last refuge and build up your roster of psionically charged fighters to prevent the end of the world.
